title: New York, Baltimore Power Prices Soar on Threat of Deeper Chill
description: Power prices in New York City and other major population centers are surging to unprecedented heights as a record-setting cold spell threatens to intensify in coming days.
content: Power prices in New York City and other major population centers are surging to unprecedented heights as a record-setting cold spell threatens to intensify in coming days.
